name: Laravel + Node Dev
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'cd apps/api && composer install || true; cd ../web && npm install || true'
postAttachCommand:
bash -lc '
       cd apps/api && php artisan key:generate --ansi 2>/dev/null || true && php artisan serve --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 &
       cd ../../apps/web && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000
     '
